meanings.sent1: The loud noise ails my ears.
meanings.sent2: The sharp rock ails my foot.
meanings.sent3: The spicy food ails my tongue.
meanings.sent4: The dark room ails my eyes.
meanings.sent5: The heavy backpack ails my shoulders.

meanings.definition: To be unwell or suffer from an illness
meanings.sent3: The cat ails from a stomachache.
meanings.sent4: The plant ails from lack of sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The old dog ails with arthritis.
